description: What do you do when you get two of our best models in a room with DB's enforcers? A HARD TIME. Claire and Orlando are unforgiving and relentless pushing the girls through an extreme ordeal with no breaks for these bitches. This is an All Live Action - no holds edit, which is pretty unique even for a live show featuring the cattle prod, inverted suspension, predicament bondage, metal device suspension, heavy neck play... and well, I could write a long boring description but the action speaks for itself! Be sure not to miss the only time Cherry and Lorelei have subbed together on camera together - truly a unique treat!
title: Claire & Orlando vs Lorelei & Cherry
